name: JusteJuice
tagline: Deliciously fruity e-juice made in NZ by Marc Seidler
body:
### APPLE PIE  
Old Fashioned Apple pie - tart apples, warm cinnamon, buttery pastry with fresh whipped cream....just like when you were a kid 

### CRANAPPLE TART 
The tartness of cranberries, the sweetness of apples, wrapped in a buttery pastry.

### VANILLA CUSTARD
Smooth and creamy vanilla custard.

### MONKEY DRAGON
Bananas, cream and a fruity overtone. A delicious candy like combination that is not too sweet, a true delight for your tastebuds.

### JUICY MANGO
A tropical mango base, blended with tasty fruits, not creamy, but clear & pure juicy mango goodness, like the real thing.

### JACKFRUIT JUNGLE
A unique tasting juice with jackfruit and exotic fruits that will make your tastebuds go bananas!

### RAZZAPPLE MACARON
Raspberries and Apples, jamming together, with a light almond cookie on the exhale, powdered sugar included. Sweet, but complex, a perfect morning vape with your coffee.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
